section.p: To create a new parameter set click either New... or Clone... (if you want to create a parameter set similar to the currently chosen). You can also provide additional comment about what the parameter set is for. Once you created a new parameter set, you can modify individual parameter values as described in .

note.p: If you wish to save changes in XSLT Parameter Sets go to View Save View... to save your changes either for the current document or the template. If you forgot to save the changes and closed the document, then open document from Recent File List: your changes will be restored for this document.
